name: Boffin
ability: The Demon (even if drunk or poisoned) has a not-in-play good character's ability. You both know which.

legacy.firstNightReminder: Show the Boffin and Demon a not-in-play good character token. The Demon gains that ability.

firstNight.description: The Demon has a not-in-play good character's ability. You both know which.

information.customMessage: Assign a not-in-play good character's ability to the Demon.
